means: （浓液等）慢慢地冒出，渗出( ooze的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Manchester United were by now oozing with confidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 曼彻斯特联队现在充满信心。

sentence.Network_en: Blood was oozing out of the wound on his leg.
sentence.Network_cn: 血正从他腿上的伤口渗出来.

sentence.Network_en: The wound had not healed properly and was oozing pus.
sentence.Network_cn: 伤口未真正痊瘉,还在流脓.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...粘剂对基材的润湿不好而产生的无胶圆点或压敏胶粘带卷取时带入的空气在胶面上形成的近似圆形的不平整缺陷。5、溢胶 oozing压敏胶粘剂从卷状的端面溢出，造成端面发粘的现象。.
on-machine coating 在机涂膜oozing 渗泌opalescence 乳光
A creature was oozing out of ot ! was it a sea monster ?, 一种东西正在从里面流出来它是一个海底怪物吗?

globe 地球仪globigerina ooze 抱球虫软泥globigerinae 抱球虫类

entry.def: When a thick or sticky liquid oozes from something or when something oozes it, the liquid flows slowly and in small quantities.

example.ex: He saw there was a big hole in the back of the man's head, blood was still oozing from it...
example.tran: 他看到这个男人后脑勺上有道大口子，血还在往外渗。

example.ex: The lava will just ooze gently out of the crater...
example.tran: 岩浆就会从火山口缓缓涌流出来。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something oozes a quality or characteristic, or oozes with it, you mean that they show it very strongly.

example.ex: Outwardly, Graham will ooze all his old confidence...
example.tran: 格雷厄姆表面上看起来会像过去一样满怀信心。
这幢伊丽莎白时期的房子散发着迷人的魅力。

entry.tran: （尤指河、湖、海底的）软泥，淤泥，泥浆
entry.def: You can refer to any thick, sticky, liquid substance as ooze, especially the mud at the bottom of a river, lake, or the sea.

example.ex: He grabbed into the ooze and came up clutching a large toad.
example.tran: 他把手伸进淤泥里捞摸，结果抓上来一只巨大的蟾蜍。
